title: What font is?
content:
Please Help me. Thank you very much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/perfeccion_5539.jpg)
author: Luzzy

comments.content:
Looks to be Bitstream's version of Brush Script (poorly kerned):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/brush-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417025909/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/brush-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/brush-script/")
